      • getCustomRecordsAsDetachedMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,byte[]> getCustomRecordsAsDetachedMap()
        Returns custom_records as a detached map. I.e. modifications in returned map does not affect data in object. A new map is created for each call.

      • setCustomRecords
